		Question: who is michael buble
		Answer:
answer: Michael Buble is a Canadian singer, songwriter, actor, producer, husband, and father. He is married to Luisana Lopilato and has three children. He has won four Grammy Awards and has sold over 75 million records worldwide. He is a member of the Order of Canada and a UNICEF Goodwill Ambassador. He has a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame and is a supporter of the Make-A-Wish Foundation.
